abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Brotherhood Terminator Squad
■ Paladin Squad

abilities.name: Empyric Amplification (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, Psychic weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

abilities.name: Focused Mind (Psychic)
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack with a Psychic weapon, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Brotherhood Terminator Squad
■ Paladin Squad

abilities.name: Exemplar of the Silvered Host
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, on a Critical Wound, the target suffers 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: Strands of Fate (Psychic)
abilities.description: The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Purgation Squad
■ Strike Squad

abilities.name: Ethereal Castigation (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.

abilities.name: Martial Fury
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Words of Power (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Dread Bearing (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from that test

This model can be attached to the following units:

■ Paladin Squad

abilities.name: Sanctic Hood
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

abilities.name: Vortex of Doom (Psychic)
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this Psyker and roll one D6: on a 1, this Psyker’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 2D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 2D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Servitors
■ Strike Squad

abilities.name: Awaken the Machine Spirit
abilities.description: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE model within 6" of this model. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time that VEHICLE model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Omnissiah’s Blessing
abilities.description: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly Grey Knights Vehicle model within 3" of this model. That Vehicle model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

abilities.name: Techmarine
abilities.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly Grey Knights Vehicle units, unless it is leading a unit, this model has the Lone Operative ability

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Hammerhand (Psychic)
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Champion of the Order of Purifiers (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s Purifying Flame.

abilities.name: Foresight of the Prognosticars (Psychic)
abilities.description: Once per turn, the first time a saving throw is failed for this model, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following unit:
■ Purifier Squad

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Might of Purity (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the characteristics of models in that unit and to any roll or test made for models in that unit (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

abilities.name: Master Strategist
abilities.description: Once per battle, one unit from your army with this ability can be targeted by a Stratagem for 0CP, even if another unit from your army has already been targeted by that Stratagem this phase.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Brotherhood Terminator Squad
■ Paladin Squad

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Surge of Wrath (Psychic)
abilities.description: Once per battle round, in the Fight phase, one model from your army with this ability can use it before resolving its attacks. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time that model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll, you can re-roll the Wound roll and you can re-roll the Damage roll.

abilities.name: Heroism’s Favour
abilities.description: Each time you target this model with a Stratagem, it only costs 1CP to use, even if the CP cost is higher

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Sanctuary (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Hammer Aflame (Psychic)
abilities.description: Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model’s unit and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that unit has the Daemon keyword: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Brotherhood Terminator Squad
■ Paladin Squad

abilities.name: Assault Ramp
abilities.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Assault Ramp
abilities.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Assault Ramp
abilities.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Fire Support
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit it scored one or more hits against this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this Transport this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll

abilities.name: Self Repair
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

abilities.name: Interceptor
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll

abilities.name: Armoured Resilience
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Strafing Run
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll

abilities.name: Wisdom of the Ancients (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly Grey Knights Infantry unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1

abilities.name: Personal Teleporters
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" as if it were your Movement phase. If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Untouchable Purity
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds

abilities.name: One With the Warp (Psychic)
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this model’s unit declares a charge in the same turn it was set up as Reinforcements using the Deep Strike ability, add 3 to the Charge roll.

This model can be attached to the following units:

abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Land Raider Banisher
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Grey Knights Infantry models. Each Terminator model takes up the space of 2 models.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Empyric Reprisal (Psychic)
abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Inner Fortitude (Psychic)
abilities.description: Each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-10 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Aerial Assault
abilities.description: Each time a unit with the Deep Strike ability disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn

abilities.name: Astral Aim (Psychic)
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [INDIRECT FIRE] ability, provided the target of that weapon is visible to one or more other friendly Grey Knights Psyker units

abilities.name: Sanctity of Purpose
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if this unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if this unit is Below Half-strength.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save
abilities.description: This unit has a 6+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Mindlock
abilities.description: While a Brotherhood Techmarine model is leading this unit, improve the Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill characteristics of ranged and melee weapons equipped by Servitor models in this unit by 1

abilities.name: Retinue
abilities.description: While a Brotherhood Techmarine model is leading this unit, models in this unit have the Deep Strike and Teleport Assault abilities

abilities.name: Sanctifying Ritual (Psychic)
abilities.description: If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase and this unit is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker remains under you control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn

abilities.name: Fire Support
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit it scored one or more hits against this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this Transport this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll

abilities.name: Wisdom of the Ancients (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly Grey Knights Infantry unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1
